item.title: Long awaited update
item.description:
Hey,

It’s been a while! At least, that is what is said.

This blog was created with the intention of sharing my experiences working as a consultant for the field of software and machine learning engineering. I suppose because I was so intent on doing my job well that this blog was neglected. I’m going to fix that.

There was a lot going on in the time frame of the preceding year. I worked on a project that was closed down, spoke at a conference, and got the notion to launch a new business.

In next posts, I’ll go into more detail about each of these topics. Well, while I write about everyday things that intrigue me and make me want to rant about them.

Let’s begin!

item.title: Great beggining
item.description:
Welcome,

This web site is going to be kind of a blog where I will post my content related to the domain of Artificial Inteligence, Data Science and Machine Learning.

I will also write about other interesting things, like my harp playing hobby, interest to capture interesting surroundings on my phone camera and so on.

Hope you will like it and if you like it, feel free to follow and contact me.

Cheers!
